summary: Syntax file for Sybase SQL Anywhere
name: sql.vim--Fishburn-syntax
description:
Syntax file for Sybase SQL Anywhere (Adaptive Server Anywhere)

Attention Vim7 users
----------------------------
This file has been renamed to sqlanywhere.vim and version 9.0.2 is included with Vim 7.0.
A new file syntax\sql.vim has been created which manages the appropriate loading of any sql syntax file.  See :h sql.txt for more details.

Supports
------------
- keywords
- internal functions
- internal stored procedures, 
- TSQL compatability stored procedures
- external stored procedures/functions, 
- web services (HTML and XML support)
- all database options
- operators
- datatypes
- statements 
- comments
install_details: Put <sql.vim> into your .vim/syntax or vimfiles/syntax directory

author.email: dfishburn dot vim at gmail dot com

versions.release_notes: Latest updates for SQL Anywhere version 11.0.1

author.email: dfishburn dot vim at gmail dot com

versions.release_notes: Updated to 10.0.1 to keywords.  If you are using Vim 7, the file was changed to syntax/sqlanywhere.vim.  If you are using Vim 6, you can rename the file to syntax/sql.vim.
